name: Shore Reef Diving Tour – Dive into Bowen Reef’s Coral Garden
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Shore Reef Diving Tour – Dive into Bowen Reef’s Coral Garden ===
Whitsunday Islands Reef Diving Trip
SS Yongala Wreck Dive
PADI Scuba Diving Courses
PADI Open Water Dive Course
PADI Advanced Open Water Course
PADI Rescue Diver Course
PADI Bubblemaker Program for Kids
Shore Reef Diving Tour – Dive into Bowen Reef’s Coral Garden
Uncover a Vibrant Underwater World at Bowen Reef’s Foreshore Coral Garden!
Experience the Wonders of Bowen Foreshore Reef
Set out on an unforgettable journey to Bowen’s famous Horseshoe Bay Reef with our
. Departing from the Airlie Beach Dive Centre, we provide everything you need for a safe and mesmerizing dive, including top-notch gear and a professional dive guide to lead you through the stunning coral gardens. The Bowen Reef offers a shallow yet vibrant underwater world with a maximum depth of just 7 meters, making it ideal for all certified divers looking to explore an accessible and thriving coral habitat.
6 hours, including dive time and travel to and from Bowen Reef
Airlie Beach Dive Centre
All dive equipment, return trip from Airlie Beach to Bowen Reef, dive guide
After the dives we visit the famous
Explore a sheltered reef brimming with colorful corals and juvenile fish – a favorite for divers who love observing delicate reef ecosystems and underwater photography. This site, Horseshoe Bay Reef, is known for clear waters and high coral density, providing a beautiful and tranquil dive environment.
Bowen Foreshore Reef’s shallow waters are ideal for observing marine life up close. Expect to encounter:
A rainbow of healthy, flourishing corals.
An essential habitat for juvenile fish, including Butterflyfish, box fish, puffer fish, and many more.
Turtles, moray eels, stingrays, nudibranchs, clams, and even underwater dive ornaments.
Each dive promises a unique experience, with surprises waiting in every nook and cranny of this thriving reef ecosystem.
PADI or SSI certification
10 years or older
Completion of a Queensland Australia Medical Statement (available on our online registration form)
Bowen Reef offers one of the most accessible and beautiful dive sites in the Whitsundays region. With shallow depths, great visibility, and abundant marine life, it’s a dream location for certified divers of all levels looking for a day of exploration, adventure, and discovery.
Shop 11 293 Shute Harbour Road,
Airlie Beach QLD 4802

name: Night Dive Tour – Discover Reef’s Nocturnal Wonders
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Night Dive Tour – Discover Reef’s Nocturnal Wonders ===
Whitsunday Islands Reef Diving Trip
SS Yongala Wreck Dive
PADI Scuba Diving Courses
PADI Open Water Dive Course
PADI Advanced Open Water Course
PADI Rescue Diver Course
PADI Bubblemaker Program for Kids
Night Dive Tour – Discover Reef’s Nocturnal Wonders
Dive into the Enchanting Nights of Whitsundays Reefs – A Coral Garden Adventure!
Dive into Bowen Reef’s Nightlife
Fun Night Dive Tour
6 hours, including dive time and round-trip travel from Airlie Beach
Airlie Beach Dive Centre
Bowen Horseshoe Bay Reef
All dive equipment, dive guide, return trip from Airlie Beach to Bowen Reef
With a shallow depth and great visibility, the Coral Garden offers a stunning nighttime dive experience. Our guided tour provides a safe and thrilling dive environment to witness nocturnal marine life in action.
The Coral Garden at Bowen Reef comes to life with vibrant colors and marine species that reveal themselves at night:
See the reef’s healthy, colorful corals extending their polyps to feed.
Fish and Marine Life:
A habitat for juvenile fish, including Butterflyfish, box fish, and puffer fish.
Turtles, moray eels, stingrays, nudibranchs, clams, and more.
Encounter hidden surprises like underwater dive ornaments and bioluminescent plankton, creating a magical glow in the water.
Each night dive provides a unique and intimate view of Bowen Reef’s Coral Garden, making it a memorable experience for divers of all levels.
PADI or SSI certification
10 years or older
Completion of a Queensland Australia Medical Statement (available on our online registration form)
This tour is designed for certified divers ready to explore the mesmerizing nightlife of Bowen Reef in a safe and supportive environment.
Reserve Your Spot for an Enchanting Night Dive
Don’t miss the chance to experience Bowen Foreshore Reef after dark! Book your spot today and dive into the mystery and beauty of one of the Whitsundays’ most unique underwater environments.
Shop 11 293 Shute Harbour Road,
Airlie Beach QLD 4802

name: SS YONGALA WRECK DIVE
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: SS YONGALA WRECK DIVE ===
Whitsunday Islands Reef Diving Trip
SS Yongala Wreck Dive
PADI Scuba Diving Courses
PADI Open Water Dive Course
PADI Advanced Open Water Course
PADI Rescue Diver Course
PADI Bubblemaker Program for Kids
Explore one of Australias most famous Shipwrecks
Wreck Dive Adventure – SS Yongala: Uncover History and Marine Wonders Beneath the Waves!
Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime diving adventure at the legendary
, a world-renowned wreck dive site celebrated as one of Australia’s most captivating underwater attractions. Offering a perfect blend of rich history, diverse marine life, and awe-inspiring exploration, this experience is a must for every certified diver.
What’s Included in Your SS Yongala Wreck Dive Adventure:
Two Guided Wreck Dives
: Explore the majestic SS Yongala with the expertise of our highly-trained dive instructors, who will guide you through every intricate detail of this iconic site.
: We provide all the essential gear, ensuring a seamless and memorable dive. Just bring your sense of adventure!
Wreck Dive and Deep Dive E-learning
: Enhance your underwater skills and knowledge before you dive with our specially designed e-learning program.
Round-Trip Transport from Airlie Beach
: Enjoy convenient and stress-free travel, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the adventure.
Discover the SS Yongala Wreck
Dive into history as you explore the
, a passenger ship that tragically sank in 1911 and has since transformed into a vibrant underwater haven. Home to a spectacular array of marine life, this wreck is teeming with
giant groupers, curious sea turtles, eagle rays, colorful coral formations, and even sharks
. The combination of historical intrigue and thriving biodiversity makes it an unforgettable dive experience.
Important Information for Your Adventure:
: Participants must be certified divers to join this dive.
PADI Advanced Open Water Certification
: Take your diving expertise to new depths with this add-on course, available for $250. It includes comprehensive PADI e-learning modules focused on deep diving skills and techniques.
Why Choose a Wreck Dive at SS Yongala?
Diving the SS Yongala is a rare opportunity to combine historical exploration with stunning marine encounters. This unique wreck site has consistently been ranked among the top diving destinations in the world due to its rich ecosystem and the fascinating story behind its sinking. Whether you’re captivated by marine life or the mysteries of history, this dive offers a truly unique experience you’ll cherish forever.
Ready to Dive into History?
Don’t miss out on this breathtaking adventure beneath the waves!
Book your SS Yongala Wreck Dive today
and create memories that will last a lifetime.
Shop 11 293 Shute Harbour Road,
Airlie Beach QLD 4802
